mapper.select: SELECT zhujiid as albumId, zname as aname, js, songerid, fxgs, fbtime, cjtime, img, songer.sname as singername FROM zhuanji, songer WHERE zhuanji.songerid = songer.sid AND zhujiid =#{id}
select song.sid, song.sname, song.song, song.img, t.name as typeName, song.fbtime from song ,type t where song.type=t.tid and song.zjid=#{0};
